description:
Yuzuka is starting to get used to using water magic, but when Chiya asks her if there`s any benefit to being a magical girl, she`s shaken by the fact that she can`t answer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Has Anything Good Happened for You Since You Became a Magical Girl?
Mahou Shoujo ni Natte Merit wa Atta no?
Tu vois des bons côtés à être devenue magicienne ?
魔法少女になってメリットはあったの?
